original_text: So Moses returned to the Lord. He said to the Lord, ‘Please listen to me. These people have done a very great sin. They have made a gold idol to worship as their god.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께로 다시 나아가 여짜오되 슬프도소이다 이 백성이 자기들을 위하여 금 신을 만들었사오니 큰 죄를 범하였나이다

sentences.original_text: So Moses returned to the Lord.
These people have done a very great sin.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 백성들이 매우 큰 죄를 지었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They have made a gold idol
